title: Forum Enhancement Kit: F.E.K 4.0
body:
The servers for FEK 4.0 have been taken down in preperation for FEK 5.0

Please remove FEK from Greasemonkey or Tampermonkey. If the only thing you used Grease/Tampermonkey for was FEK, then you can uninstall that script manager as well.

FEK 5.0 will be having frequent updates to quickly bring back all of the features that existed in 4.0

If you want you can check out 5.0 you can do so in the thread below. Please note that it's not finished yet and using it with Discussion Mode can be extremely buggy! Currently it's only recommended to use Chronological Mode with 5.0 but I hope to fix that soon.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/VZXIG5LR-fek-version-51

replies.body:
**FEK Features**

You can customize FEK to your liking and turn off some features if you don't like them by [using the Control Panel](http://i.imgur.com/OaB7AxX.jpg).
---

**Avatars and Status Icons**

[As seen in the first post](http://i.imgur.com/cfLwfdB.jpg), there are status indicators. There are many different avatar size options from 100x100 to 200x200.

---

**Fallback Avatars**

If you would rather not see a person's summoner icon if they don't have a FEK avatar, multiple options are available to replace those. Fizz's Trident, Poro, and Happy Cloud.

http://i.imgur.com/ETJQDlJ.png[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/gN3PoCe.png[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/t9RRqTp.png[/img]

---

**User Pop-up**

When you hover your mouse over somebody's avatar, a pop-up box will appear. In it will be many useful links:

* **View Profile:** Opens up their board's profile in a new window
* **View Avatar:** Opens up their FEK avatar in a new window
* **LoLNexus:** Opens up their LoLNexus page in a new window
* **OP.GG:** Opens up their op.gg page in a new window
* **Blacklist:** Adds/Removes them from your blacklist

This feature is integral to FEK and can only be disabled if you disable avatars.

http://i.imgur.com/MM0jVEx.jpg[/img]

---

**Enhanced Voting**

Hover your mouse over somebody's votes and it will display either the total votes on the post/thread, or it will show individual upvotes and downvotes. By default, the latter is selected but you can toggle it in the FEK control panel.

http://i.imgur.com/lNzShwO.png[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/Q5JYlX9.png[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/NDclSdu.png[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/Skhi8WJ.png[/img]

You also have the option to completely remove votes as well.

http://i.imgur.com/JepoVLn.png[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/XZHsPDi.jpg[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/lNH9YfK.jpg[/img]

---

**Blacklisting**

http://i.imgur.com/LqBQjn6.jpg[/img]

To blacklist somebody, hover your mouse over their avatar and click on the "Blacklist" link.
http://i.imgur.com/P5AAevZ.gif[/img]

You will receive an alert.
http://i.imgur.com/tIqUlIH.png[/img]

Click on the "Blacklist" tab on the FEK control panel to view the people you have blacklisted. BEING ABLE TO BLACKLIST YOURSELF, WHILE SILLY, IS INTENTIONAL!
http://i.imgur.com/ncpCHkn.png[/img]

---

**OP Style Change**

By having this on, it removes the "style" of the original poster's posts.

http://i.imgur.com/aWBBBJ6.jpg[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/AdRMVxn.jpg[/img]

---

**Enhanced Thread Preview**

When you hover your mouse over a thread, a new popup box now appears instantly. Furthermore, champion/item/summoner icons are now displayed as well so you no longer have to see something like \{{champion:105}} 

http://i.imgur.com/AneV3d3.png[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/YELdMpM.jpg[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/1Zsteqx.png[/img]

---

**Thread Highlighting**

Threads you make will be highlighted in a different color so you can see them easier. Below, a thread I made has a black background.

http://i.imgur.com/83yrh32.jpg[/img]

---

**Boards Dropdown Menu**

By hovering your mouse over "Boards" at the top, a dropdown navbar will appear.

http://i.imgur.com/yzYIr2F.jpg[/img]

---

**Animated Thumbnails**

http://i.imgur.com/LVUrGkC.gif[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/ftgb7vr.gif[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/SMw8Mf0.gif[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/1NdpRHr.gif[/img]


You can also hide thumbnail previews if you want.

http://i.imgur.com/jcg9uVp.png[/img]

BEFORE
http://i.imgur.com/nzDJznR.png[/img]

AFTER
http://i.imgur.com/EYjAJo3.png[/img]

---

**Sticky Navbar**

With this option enabled, the navigation bar will always be at the top of the screen.

http://i.imgur.com/VqayMBQ.jpg[/img]

---

**Media Embedding**

.webms will no longer show up as a link, and instead be embedded.

In addition to this, YouTube videos will also automatically be embedded.

http://i.imgur.com/9WfilTz.jpg[/img]

---

**Rioters**

Rioters have their titles displayed underneath them.

http://i.imgur.com/NDclSdu.png[/img]

---

**Known bugs**

* Original poster's votes get displaced when the thread's title is too long

CORRECT
http://i.imgur.com/hTqxaCT.jpg[/img]

BUG
http://i.imgur.com/vDKbskJ.jpg[/img]

* Some people's status icons always show as "away" due to a timezone issue.

---

**Changelog 4.3.0**
---
**Overview**

* **Change:** Twitter notifications
* **Change:** Status icons


* **Bug Fix:** .webm issues
* **Bug Fix:** avatar error in Discussion View


* **New:** Roll the die
* **New:** Error handling
* **New:** Favorite icons
* **New:** Hide boards from main page
* **New:** More color options for thread highlighting
---
**Change: Twitter notifications**

People have been telling me that they would misclick the notification, removing it instead of actually clicking on the link. I've also removed seconds from the timestamp because that information is pointless.

=== Before ===
http://i.imgur.com/HCqUGWa.jpg[/img]

=== After ===
http://i.imgur.com/rXKHgTF.jpg[/img]
---
**Change: Status icons**

As of FEK 4.3 status icons have been REMOVED! This is likely not permanent.

My reasons for doing this is as follows:

* People on computers/mobile devices without FEK would show up as red/offline, even though they are actively posting
* Badge space becomes very crowded for some people, and people will be getting season badges soon which will only make it more crowded

http://i.imgur.com/ufn5ty6.jpg[/img]
---
**Bug Fix: .webm issues**

=== Before ===
http://i.imgur.com/BncWQZC.jpg[/img]

=== After ===
http://i.imgur.com/njVAi1F.jpg[/img]
---
**Bug Fix: avatar error in Discussion View**

=== Before ===
http://i.imgur.com/t2s5kj0.jpg[/img]

=== After ===
http://i.imgur.com/jD6eH62.jpg[/img]
---
**New: Roll the die**

Typing [roll] will generate a random number 1 to 1000 in its place. This is for fun and maybe some people can think of some use for it.

http://i.imgur.com/ucy0hc5.jpg[/img]
---
**New: Error handling**

In the past, Riot would alter the Boards in such a way that it would break FEK. This is extremely annoying because announcements then fail to work so nobody knows what's going on. Now whenever something goes wrong, FEK will gracefully recover itself and continue on and an error message will be left in the upper-right corner of the screen.

http://i.imgur.com/G9T1YsM.jpg[/img]
---
**New: Favorite icons**

You can now customize the Champion/Spell/Item icons! Select your favorites from the FEK control panel by pressing the ~ button. Note that not all items are available, because of the sheer amount that exist.

http://i.imgur.com/DlrteUJ.jpg[/img]
---
**New: Hide boards from main page**

Do you visit the main page often, but just don't care about some Boards? Select "Hidden Boards" on the FEK control panel and check all Boards that you would like to hide.

http://i.imgur.com/lop2NQv.jpg[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/kLB0pzz.jpg[/img]
---
**New: More color options for thread highlighting**

You can now choose an assorted color to highlight your threads. Look under here in the FEK control panel: LoL Boards -> Navigation Enhancements

http://i.imgur.com/9AgmihB.jpg[/img]
---
**Click the link below to download the latest version of FEK.**

http://videomatic3.diskstation.me/~tundrafizz/fek/FEK.user.js

**Changelog 4.4.0**
---
**New: Friends/Private Messaging System (BETA)**

So there's only one thing in this update that differs from the previous one, and that is the private messaging system. Keep in mind that this is an extremely early version of this feature, and will be changing drastically over the course of many updates. As of right now it's quite rough around the edges which is why I put (BETA) above.

For example, there are no alerts or notifications when you get a friend request or PM, but that is something I will be adding next to make the whole system a lot more manageable.

Below are five screenshots that will give a brief summary of how it works.

**Changelog 4.4.3**
---
**Overview**

* **Bug Fix:** Voting
* **Bug Fix:** Deleted Posts
* **Bug Fix:** Black Bar
* **Bug Fix:** Junk Text
* **Bug Fix:** User Popup Boxes
* **Bug Fix:** Blacklisting
* **Miscellaneous**
---
**Bug Fix:** Voting

The total score of a post isn't displayed anymore when you mouse over someone's posts. This means that the downvote arrow will no longer shift awkwardly.

Before
http://i.imgur.com/SpFjahl.png[/img]

After
http://i.imgur.com/MvO9NFp.png[/img]
---
**Bug Fix:** Deleted Posts

The previous update made using FEK in Discussion View a lot better. However it also caused a bug with deleted posts to pop up. This has now been fixed.

Before
http://i.imgur.com/8xqxluY.png[/img]

After
http://i.imgur.com/UjU3t39.png[/img]
---
**Bug Fix:** Black Bar

If your browser's window is too wide, a horizontal scrollbar will appear and an annoying black bar will appear.  This has now been fixed.

Before
http://i.imgur.com/eVv4xmz.jpg[/img]

After
http://i.imgur.com/QOBPB9w.jpg[/img]
---
**Bug Fix:** Junk Text

Sometimes when loading a webpage you'll see a bunch of crap that's a part of the FEK control panel. It can be pretty annoying so you will no longer see this happen.

Removed
http://i.imgur.com/3NzOVv5.jpg[/img]
---
**Bug Fix:** User Popup Boxes

Sometimes when you hover your mouse over a person's name/avatar (as seen by the underlined name in both images), the popup box would fail to appear. This has now been fixed.

Before
http://i.imgur.com/BIHRVvw.jpg[/img]

After
http://i.imgur.com/FxfORGW.png[/img]
---
**Bug Fix:** Blacklisting

There was a bug where blacklisted people would still have their threads appear on a Boards index. This has now been fixed.

Another change is that the blacklist on the FEK control panel now updates when you click on the tab, rather than you needing to refresh the page.
---
**Miscellaneous**

Two additional things I am currently working on:

* Minimizing posts in Discussion View

* Buggy .webm avatars

Since .webm avatars are currently bugged, I have replaced a couple people's .webms with .gifs. I'll put their .webms back once the bug gets fixed.

**Bug Fix:** Database Synchronization

There was a problem that remained when Riot changed the style of the Boards about a month ago which caused FEK to not send new usernames to the database. This meant there would be issues I'd need to manually fix whenever a person got a name change so that their avatar would update.

This bug has now been fixed.
